#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
typedef long long LL;
 
const int MAXN = 1e5 + 9;
const LL MOD = 1e9 + 7;
 
int tc;
int Reg,Free;
LL dp[106][202][102][4];
 
inline LL go(int runs,int reg,int free,int cont){
	if(cont > 2)
		return 0;
	if(reg == 0){
		return (runs >= 100);
	}
	if(runs >= 100){
		return (reg >= 0 && free >= 0);
	}
	LL &ret = dp[runs][reg][free][cont];
	if(ret != -1)
		return ret;
	ret = 0;
	if(reg > 0){
		ret += go(runs + 0,reg - 1,free,cont + 1);
		ret += go(runs + 1,reg - 1,free,0);
		ret += go(runs + 2,reg - 1,free,0);
		ret += go(runs + 4,reg - 1,free,0);
		ret += go(runs + 6,reg - 1,free,0);
	}
	if(free > 0){
		ret += go(runs + 0,reg,free - 1,cont);
		ret += go(runs + 1,reg,free - 1,cont);
		ret += go(runs + 2,reg,free - 1,cont);
		ret += go(runs + 4,reg,free - 1,cont);
		ret += go(runs + 6,reg,free - 1,cont);
	}	
	while(ret >= MOD) 
		ret -= MOD;
	return ret;
}
 
int main (){
	memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
	scanf("%d",&tc);	
	while(tc--){
		scanf("%d %d",&Reg,&Free);
		LL ans = go(0,Reg,Free,0);
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
